org.jlab.coda.emu.support.configurer

Class Configurer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jlab.coda.emu.support.configurer.Configurer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.w3c.dom.DOMErrorHandler, org.w3c.dom.ls.LSParserFilter

    public class Configurer
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.w3c.dom.DOMErrorHandler, org.w3c.dom.ls.LSParserFilter
    This class is a singleton and contains one static reference to a DOM builder and a DOM serializer. It is used to configure the EMU using XML from a file or string.

    LSParserFilters provide applications the ability to examine nodes as they are being constructed while parsing. As each node is examined, it may be modified or removed, or the entire parse may be terminated early.

    Author:
    heyes Created on Sep 12, 2008

      • getValue

        public static java.lang.String getValue(org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                                        java.lang.String path)
                                 throws DataNotFoundException
        Method to get the value of the Node object given by the path argument or null if there is no such object. If the Node is an attribute it's value is returned, else if not an attribute, then it returns it's first child's text (or null if no kids).
        Parameters:
        doc - DOM XML Document object
        path - path into the XML object
        Returns:
        value of the Node associated with the given path
        Throws:
        DataNotFoundException - never thrown

      • setValue

        public static void setValue(org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                            java.lang.String path,
                            java.lang.String value)
                     throws DataNotFoundException
        Method to set the value of the DataNode object associated with the Node object given by the path argument. Does nothing if there is no DataNode object at the given path.
        Parameters:
        doc - DOM XML Document object
        path - path into the XML object
        value - value to set the DataNode object to
        Throws:
        DataNotFoundException - when

      • newValue

        public static void newValue(org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                            java.lang.String path,
                            java.lang.String name,
                            java.lang.String value)
                     throws DataNotFoundException
        Method to add an attribute (name/value pair) DataNode object to or replace one with the same name associated with the Node object given by the path argument. Does nothing if there is no Node object at the given path.

        Not Used.

        Parameters:
        doc - DOM XML Document object
        path - path into the XML object
        name - name of new attribute to add
        value - value of the new attribute
        Throws:
        DataNotFoundException - when

      • treeToPanel

        public static DataNode treeToPanel(org.w3c.dom.Node node,
                                   int level)
        Recursive method to, using the given arg as the top of the tree, add all nodes in the tree to a JPanel for display in a GUI.

        (Formerly method named getDataNodes.)

        Parameters:
        node - Node object to be displayed in a JPanel
        level - level of node in XML document tree (0 = top)
        Returns:
        DataNode object associated with arg
